title: Mobile boards has notifications again!
body: Just go under the upper right menu of the mobile site and next to your profile you'll see notifications.

replies.body: yay glad you noticed! We put in a fix for the mobile notifications being hidden yesterday. Again, really sorry for the issue and our delays on fixing it :(. Let me know if you have any issues with the nav bar (mobile or desktop).

Hi usher voice! Sorry if I step in here to go slightly off topic, but speaking of boards on mobile, is there any plan to implement rioter rundown?

Thanks and keep it up! :)
heya! unfortunately, I only worked on the navigation bar for leagueoflegends.com (which happens to include boards) so I actually don't know anything about boards development :(
No problem, thanks for the repy! ^^
